summary: Dora, driven away from her town by malicious gossip following her first love affair, has a series of short-lived adventures until she falls in love with Nino, a small time crook. In Parma, a police officer courts her but she keeps thinking of Nino and makes up her mind to join him. But he has found a new lover.
cast: Nino Manfredi|Catherine Spaak|Didi Perego|Lando Buzzanca|Vanni De Maigret|Umberto D'Orsi|Rosalia Maggio|Ugo Fangareggi|Nando Angelini|Salvo Randone|Francesco Barilli|Mario Brega
title: La chica de Parma
